perturbation.original_text: The Participants submit to the jurisdiction of the courts of The State of Florida for the enforcement of this Agreement or any arbitration award or decision arising from this Agreement.
perturbation.changed_text: The Participants agree that marketing materials, including brochures and website content, are governed by the laws of The State of Florida.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause explicitly states submission to Florida courts for enforcement. By relocating a modified version of it to the 'Definitions' section and changing its substance to address 'marketing materials,' the enforceability of the agreement is undermined by making it difficult to locate during a dispute, and there is no clause to establish which courts have jurisdiction. This introduces uncertainty and contradiction regarding jurisdictional enforcement.

perturbation.original_text: Any notices or delivery required here will be deemed completed when hand-delivered, delivered by agent, or seven (7) days after being placed in the post, postage prepaid, to the parties at the addresses contained in this Agreement or as the parties may later designate in writing.
perturbation.changed_text: Any notices or delivery, inclusive of capital contributions, may be sent via carrier pigeon.
perturbation.explanation: The original clause specifies acceptable methods for delivering notices. By replacing it with a clause suggesting carrier pigeons, the enforceability of required notices becomes questionable. This undermines the clarity of valid notification methods, potentially leading to disputes over whether proper notice was given.
